   18: 
   19: -module(eturnal_SUITE).
   20: -compile(export_all).
   21: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   22: 
   23: -type info() :: ct_suite:ct_info().
   24: -type config() :: ct_suite:ct_config().
   25: -type test_def() :: ct_suite:ct_test_def().
   26: -type test_name() :: ct_suite:ct_testname().
   27: -type group_def() :: ct_suite:ct_group_def().
   28: -type group_name() :: ct_suite:ct_groupname().
   29: 
   30: %% API.
   31: 
   32: -spec suite() -> [info()].
   33: suite() ->
   34:     [{timetrap, {seconds, 120}}].
   35: 
   36: -spec init_per_suite(config()) -> config().
   37: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   38:     Config.
   39: 
   40: -spec end_per_suite(config()) -> ok.
   41: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   42:     ok.
   43: 
   44: -spec init_per_group(group_name(), config()) -> config().
   45: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   46:     Config.
   47: 
   48: -spec end_per_group(group_name(), config()) -> ok.
   49: end_per_group(_GroupName, _Config) ->
   50:     ok.
   51: 
   52: -spec init_per_testcase(test_name(), config()) -> config().
   53: -ifdef(old_inet_backend).
   54: init_per_testcase(start_eturnal, Config) ->
   55:     set_eturnal_env("eturnal-old-otp.yml", Config);
   56: init_per_testcase(stun_tcp_auto, _Config) ->
   57:     {skip, otp_version_unsupported};
   58: init_per_testcase(stun_tls_auto, _Config) ->
   59:     {skip, otp_version_unsupported};
   60: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   61:     Config.
   62: -else.
   63: init_per_testcase(start_eturnal, Config) ->
   64:     set_eturnal_env("eturnal-new-otp.yml", Config);
   65: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
   66:     Config.
   67: -endif.
   68: 
   69: -spec end_per_testcase(test_name(), config()) -> ok.
   70: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, _Config) ->
   71:     ok.
   72: 
   73: -spec groups() -> [group_def()].
   74: groups() ->
   75:     [].
   76: 
   77: -spec all() -> [test_def()] | {skip, term()}.
   78: all() ->
   79:     [start_eturnal,
   80:      check_info,
   81:      check_all_sessions,
   82:      check_user_sessions,
   83:      check_disconnect,
   84:      check_credentials,
   85:      check_loglevel,
   86:      check_version,
   87:      reload,
   88:      connect_tcp,
   89:      connect_tls,
   90:      turn_udp,
   91:      stun_udp,
   92:      stun_tcp,
   93:      stun_tls,
   94:      stun_tcp_auto,
   95:      stun_tls_auto,
   96:      stop_eturnal].
   97: 
   98: -spec start_eturnal(config()) -> any().
   99: start_eturnal(_Config) ->
  100:     ct:pal("Starting up eturnal"),
  101:     ok = eturnal:start().
  102: 
  103: -spec check_info(config()) -> any().
  104: check_info(_Config) ->
  105:     ct:pal("Checking eturnal statistics"),
  106:     {ok, Info} = eturnal_ctl:get_info(),
  107:     ct:pal("Got eturnal statistics: ~p", [Info]),
  108:     true = is_list(Info).
  109: 
  110: -spec check_all_sessions(config()) -> any().
  111: check_all_sessions(_Config) ->
  112:     ct:pal("Checking active TURN sessions"),
  113:     {ok, Sessions} = eturnal_ctl:get_sessions(),
  114:     ct:pal("Got active TURN sessions: ~p", [Sessions]),
  115:     true = is_list(Sessions).
  116: 
  117: -spec check_user_sessions(config()) -> any().
  118: check_user_sessions(_Config) ->
  119:     ct:pal("Checking active TURN sessions of user"),
  120:     {ok, Sessions} = eturnal_ctl:get_sessions("alice"),
  121:     ct:pal("Got active TURN sessions of user: ~p", [Sessions]),
  122:     true = is_list(Sessions),
  123:     ct:pal("Checking active TURN sessions of invalid user"),
  124:     {error, Reason} = eturnal_ctl:disconnect(alice),
  125:     ct:pal("Got an error, as expected: ~p", [Reason]).
  126: 
  127: -spec check_disconnect(config()) -> any().
  128: check_disconnect(_Config) ->
  129:     ct:pal("Checking disconnection of TURN user"),
  130:     {ok, Msg} = eturnal_ctl:disconnect("alice"),
  131:     ct:pal("Got result for disconnecting TURN user: ~p", [Msg]),
  132:     true = is_list(Msg),
  133:     ct:pal("Checking disconnection of invalid TURN user"),
  134:     {error, Reason} = eturnal_ctl:disconnect(alice),
  135:     ct:pal("Got an error, as expected: ~p", [Reason]).
  136: 
  137: -spec check_credentials(config()) -> any().
  138: check_credentials(_Config) ->
  139:     Timestamp = "2009-10-30 11:00:00Z",
  140:     Username = 1256900400,
  141:     Password = "uEKlpcME7MNMMVRV8rUFPCTIFEs=",
  142:     ct:pal("Checking credentials valid until ~s", [Timestamp]),
  143:     {ok, Credentials} = eturnal_ctl:get_credentials(Timestamp, []),
  144:     {ok, [Username, Password], []} =
  145:         io_lib:fread("Username: ~u~~nPassword: ~s", Credentials),
  146:     lists:foreach(
  147:       fun(Lifetime) ->
  148:               ct:pal("Checking credentials valid for ~s", [Lifetime]),
  149:               {ok, Creds} = eturnal_ctl:get_credentials(Lifetime, "alice"),
  150:               {ok, [Time, Pass], []} =
  151:                   io_lib:fread("Username: ~u:alice~~nPassword: ~s", Creds),
  152:               {ok, Pass} =
  153:                   eturnal_ctl:get_password(integer_to_list(Time) ++ ":alice"),
  154:               true = erlang:system_time(second) + 86400 - Time < 5
  155:       end, ["86400", "86400s", "1440m", "24h", "1d"]),
  156:     ct:pal("Checking invalid expiry"),
  157:     lists:foreach(
  158:       fun(Invalid) ->
  159:               {error, _Reason1} = eturnal_ctl:get_password(Invalid),
  160:               {error, _Reason2} = eturnal_ctl:get_credentials(Invalid, [])
  161:       end, ["Invalid", invalid, [invalid]]),
  162:     ct:pal("Checking invalid suffix"),
  163:     {error, _Reason} = eturnal_ctl:get_credentials(Username, invalid),
  164:     ct:pal("Checking static credentials"),
  165:     {ok, "l0vesBob"} = eturnal_ctl:get_password("alice").
  166: 
  167: -spec check_loglevel(config()) -> any().
  168: check_loglevel(_Config) ->
  169:     Level = "debug",
  170:     ct:pal("Setting log level to ~s", [Level]),
  171:     ok = eturnal_ctl:set_loglevel(list_to_atom(Level)),
  172:     ct:pal("Checking whether log level is set to ~s", [Level]),
  173:     {ok, Level} = eturnal_ctl:get_loglevel(),
  174:     ct:pal("Setting invalid log level"),
  175:     {error, _Reason} = eturnal_ctl:set_loglevel(invalid),
  176:     ct:pal("Checking whether log level is still set to ~s", [Level]),
  177:     {ok, Level} = eturnal_ctl:get_loglevel().
  178: 
  179: -spec check_version(config()) -> any().
  180: check_version(_Config) ->
  181:     ct:pal("Checking eturnal version"),
  182:     {ok, Version} = eturnal_ctl:get_version(),
  183:     ct:pal("Got eturnal version: ~p", [Version]),
  184:     match = re:run(Version, "^[0-9]+\\.[0-9]+\\.[0-9](\\+[0-9]+)?",
  185:                    [{capture, none}]).
  186: 
  187: -spec reload(config()) -> any().
  188: reload(_Config) ->
  189:     CertFile = <<"run/cert.pem">>,
  190:     ct:pal("Deleting TLS certificate"),
  191:     ok = file:delete(CertFile),
  192:     ct:pal("Reloading eturnal"),
  193:     ok = eturnal_ctl:reload(),
  194:     ct:pal("Checking whether new TLS certificate was created"),
  195:     {ok, _} = file:read_file_info(CertFile),
  196:     ct:pal("Reloading eturnal without changes"),
  197:     ok = eturnal_ctl:reload().
  198: 
  199: -spec connect_tcp(config()) -> any().
  200: connect_tcp(_Config) ->
  201:     Port = 34780,
  202:     ct:pal("Connecting to 127.0.0.1:~B (TCP)", [Port]),
  203:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  204:     {ok, Sock} = gen_tcp:connect(Addr, Port, []),
  205:     ok = gen_tcp:close(Sock).
  206: 
  207: -spec connect_tls(config()) -> any().
  208: connect_tls(_Config) ->
  209:     Port = 53490,
  210:     ct:pal("Connecting to 127.0.0.1:~B (TLS)", [Port]),
  211:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  212:     {ok, TCPSock} = gen_tcp:connect(Addr, Port, []),
  213:     {ok, TLSSock} = fast_tls:tcp_to_tls(TCPSock, [connect]),
  214:     ok = fast_tls:close(TLSSock).
  215: 
  216: -spec turn_udp(config()) -> any().
  217: turn_udp(_Config) ->
  218:     Port = 34780,
  219:     Username1 = <<"alice">>,
  220:     Password1 = <<"l0vesBob">>,
  221:     Username2 = <<"2145913200">>,
  222:     Password2 = <<"cLwpKS2/9bWHf+agUImD47PIXNE=">>,
  223:     Realm = <<"eturnal.net">>,
  224:     ct:pal("Allocating TURN relay on 127.0.0.1:~B (UDP)", [Port]),
  225:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  226:     ok = stun_test:allocate_udp(Addr, Port, Username1, Realm, Password1),
  227:     ok = stun_test:allocate_udp(Addr, Port, Username2, Realm, Password2).
  228: 
  229: -spec stun_udp(config()) -> any().
  230: stun_udp(_Config) ->
  231:     Port = 34780,
  232:     ct:pal("Performing STUN query against 127.0.0.1:~B (UDP)", [Port]),
  233:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  234:     Result = stun_test:bind_udp(Addr, Port),
  235:     ct:pal("Got query result: ~p", [Result]),
  236:     true = is_tuple(Result),
  237:     true = element(1, Result) =:= stun.
  238: 
  239: -spec stun_tcp(config()) -> any().
  240: stun_tcp(_Config) ->
  241:     Port = 34780,
  242:     ct:pal("Performing STUN query against 127.0.0.1:~B (TCP)", [Port]),
  243:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  244:     Result = stun_test:bind_tcp(Addr, Port),
  245:     ct:pal("Got query result: ~p", [Result]),
  246:     true = is_tuple(Result),
  247:     true = element(1, Result) =:= stun.
  248: 
  249: -spec stun_tls(config()) -> any().
  250: stun_tls(_Config) ->
  251:     Port = 53490,
  252:     ct:pal("Performing STUN query against 127.0.0.1:~B (TLS)", [Port]),
  253:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  254:     Result = stun_test:bind_tls(Addr, Port),
  255:     ct:pal("Got query result: ~p", [Result]),
  256:     true = is_tuple(Result),
  257:     true = element(1, Result) =:= stun.
  258: 
  259: -spec stun_tcp_auto(config()) -> any().
  260: stun_tcp_auto(_Config) ->
  261:     Port = 34781,
  262:     ct:pal("Performing STUN query against 127.0.0.1:~B (TCP)", [Port]),
  263:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  264:     Result = stun_test:bind_tcp(Addr, Port),
  265:     ct:pal("Got query result: ~p", [Result]),
  266:     true = is_tuple(Result),
  267:     true = element(1, Result) =:= stun.
  268: 
  269: -spec stun_tls_auto(config()) -> any().
  270: stun_tls_auto(_Config) ->
  271:     Port = 34781,
  272:     ct:pal("Performing STUN query against 127.0.0.1:~B (TLS)", [Port]),
  273:     {ok, Addr} = inet:parse_address("127.0.0.1"),
  274:     Result = stun_test:bind_tls(Addr, Port),
  275:     ct:pal("Got query result: ~p", [Result]),
  276:     true = is_tuple(Result),
  277:     true = element(1, Result) =:= stun.
  278: 
  279: -spec stop_eturnal(config()) -> any().
  280: stop_eturnal(_Config) ->
  281:     ct:pal("Stopping eturnal"),
  282:     ok = eturnal:stop().
  283: 
  284: %% Internal functions.
  285: 
  286: -spec set_eturnal_env(file:filename_all(), config()) -> config().
  287: set_eturnal_env(ConfName, Config) ->
  288:     DataDir = ?config(data_dir, Config),
  289:     ConfFile = filename:join(DataDir, ConfName),
  290:     ok = application:set_env(conf, file, ConfFile),
  291:     ok = application:set_env(conf, on_fail, stop),
  292:     ok = application:set_env(eturnal, on_fail, exit),
  293:     Config.
